\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w stirred|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*?”

The Parable of the Two Sons
